text: Paula-Mae Weekes (born December 23, 1958) was the 6th president of Trinidad and Tobago from 2018 until 2023. She took office on 19 March 2018 and became the first woman to hold the office of President. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Trinidad and Tobago Category:People from Port of Spain Category:University of the West Indies alumni
title: Paula-Mae Weekes
